attributes.action: Scrap Speed Humps and replace them with cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have ever seen an ambulance with all its lights flashing and siren sounding having to virtually stop at every hump you must agree!

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Nohumps/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
